info.+content: Hajime Kindaichi may look dumb, but he is one of the smartest you will ever see. He encounters mystery after mystery with his good friend, Miyuki, and he swears to solve them in the name of his grandfather, who was a great detective.
#3: "君がいるから‥ (Kimi ga iru kara..)" by Yui Nishiwaki (eps 43-69)
#7: "Never Say Why, Never Say No" by 566 featuring Sayuri Nakano (eps 139-148)
#06: "はてしなく青い空を見た (Hateshinaku Aoi Sora wo Mita)" by Yui Nishiwaki (eps 74-87)
#11: "君がいるから‥ (Kimi ga iru kara..)" by Yui Nishiwaki (ep 148)
